name: GitFitNotFat
description: Pick a recipe then give calories, then user inputs the activity they want to do to burn off those calories. The app then returns the duration of that activity needed to burn off the calories from the food selected in addition to the calories burned for that activity. We learned how to avoid conflicts with merges while working with other collaborators in an agile work enviroment. Also, some APIs do not update their documents, and trial and error takes over.

name: Choose Your Own Adventure
description: This is a choose your own adventure game. The user is presented with a scenario and two choices. The user then selects one of the two choices and is presented with another scenario and two more choices. This continues until the user reaches the end of the game. The user can then choose to play again or exit the game. This project was a great learning experience. We learned how to work with a team and how to use git to collaborate on a project. We also learned how to use the express framework to create a web application.
